config.general.title: General
config.features.title: Features
options.RequireTool.desc: Require the pickaxe to be equiped.
options.ShowItems.desc: Draws item icons of predicted drops for mineable objects.
options.ShowLadders.desc: Draws ladder/shaft icons where they would spawn.
options.MonstersHideLadders.desc: Hides ladder locations while monsters are alive.
